name.ja: <ruby>侵略的外来種<rt>インヴェイシブ・エーリアン・スピーシース</rt></ruby>－<ruby>Ｉ．Ａ．Ｓ<rt>アイ・アース</rt></ruby>

text.en: Cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects while a face-up card is in your opponent's Field Zone. You can only use each of the following effects of "Invasive Alien Species - I.A.S" once per turn. If a face-up card is in your opponent's Field Zone: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, this card gains 1000 ATK. If a face-up card is in your opponent's Field Zone and this card is in your GY: You can Special Summon this card.
